name: Thoroughly Planned Skirmish
description:
(Only tested in Chrome, might destroy the world in other browsers. Uh, also I didn't have time to add sound.)

A strategy game where you only get one turn to plan out your whole attack/defense!

Local multiplayer only. Invite a friend over!

There are three types of units:

- Infantry. 10 of them per unit. Shoots other units, except scouts (they hide well).

- Artillery. Massive devastation, but can't defend themselves. Watch out, don't get your own units in the line of fire (scouts know how to avoid it, luckily!)

- Scout. Tells Artillery units where to shoot when enemies draw near.

When it's your turn, click a unit to select it. Click in the map to add path points. Click a path point to remove it again.

The goal is to reach your opponent's bunker with an Infantry unit!
